welcome_message_body: Welcome to Cahokia Heights, the charming city known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We hope you have a wonderful stay and explore all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your time here!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St. Louis Downtown Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: East Terminal
terminals.description: The East Terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport is used for regional flights and low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Spirit Of St Louis Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Belleville Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Belleville Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Alton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Alton Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
